## `dplyr` demo

## `dplyr` <-> SQL

<div class="double">
`dplyr`
```{r, eval=FALSE}
table %>%
  filter(field == "value") %>%
  left_join(lkup, 
    by = c("lkup_id" = "id") %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(N = sum(1)) %>%
  filter(N > 100) %>%
  arrange(desc(N)) %>%
  head(10)

```

MySQL
```{sql, eval=FALSE}
SELECT
  year, sum(1) as N
FROM table t
LEFT JOIN lkup l
  ON t.lkup_id = l.id
WHERE field = "value"
GROUP BY year
HAVING N > 100
ORDER BY N desc
LIMIT 0, 10;
```
</div>
